Text: then why exactly do you deliver us this fine piece lad?
With a name like yoshimo you must be a jap whale eater....fuck u !!!!

As someone who sponsors sea shepherd and today had their jolly roger emblem tattood on my arm. I really have to question your sanity.
I guess you must be connected to Japenese whalers - tagging this vid as terrorism is proof enough that you have no respect for the survival of endangered species.
Well the good news for the rest of the world is that the mercury in the whale meat and badly fished tuna you eat will ensure you die early, i'm sure you won't be missed.

With all due respect
Steve

@ BudShiz:

"then why exactly do you deliver us this fine piece lad?"

-> Because I belive in freedom of speech and because I do neither pass judgement on something I do not know nor do I encourage others to do so. And what about you?

------

@ jameshunt:

"With a name like yoshimo you must be a jap whale eater....fuck u !!!!"

-> No, in fact I am a German whale eater enjoying these delicious types of meat every time I visit Japan. And yes, of course I can fuck u ... at least as long as you have a tight asshole.

------

@ S_Plank:

"As someone who sponsors sea shepherd and today had their jolly roger emblem tattood on my arm."

-> And you are seriously questioning MY sanity?!

"I guess you must be connected to Japenese whalers"

-> A typical argument of the Sea Shepherds directed against all critics of their aims and tactics. Just like "you get paid by the whalers" or similar shit. But listen to me: I just have a different opinion. Period.

"tagging this vid as terrorism is proof enough that you have no respect for the survival of endangered species."

-> Why is this proof enough? Actually your random rants clearly show that you have been indoctrinated by Paul Fatson and his lies.

"Well the good news for the rest of the world is that the mercury in the whale meat and badly fished tuna you eat will ensure you die early, i'm sure you won't be missed."

-> To cover others with insults is all you can do.
